mapper.insert: insert into reply (bookId, memberId, content, rating) values(#{bookId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: select replyId from reply where memberId = #{memberId} and bookId = #{bookId}
select count(*) from reply where bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.update: update reply set content = #{content}, rating = #{rating} where replyId = #{replyId}
